Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a brown pottery ribbed and ridged vessel, the interior is covered with a brown-yellow resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of black-painted Greek (?) text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394119) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394119)
